title: Modular RPG System
description: Our asset is a modular RPG system inspired by oldschool games like Baldur's Gate, Icewind Dale and Neverwinter Nights. System is based on components and function libraries so it is fully modular and most of components are easy to customize.
longDescription:
Preview: www.youtube.com/watch?v=o9IfrjhQauo&feature=youtu.be

This pack requires basic blueprints knowledge.

In our pack u will find:
• Basic inventory Component (with option of using and deleting item)*
• Notes Tab Component*
• Statistic Component( fully customizable)*
• Quest log*
• Minimap Component ( with zoom in, zoom out and hide function)
• Minimap Icons Component
• Player stats UI*
• Examples of using skills and leveling (example skills: lockpicking, alchemy, survival)
• Dealing and taking damage
• Minor top down Hack`n Slash mechanics and blueprints*
• System for level up skills and attributes*
• System of basic creation player stats- attributes with roll dices like in d20 systems (fe. DnD)*
*Every function is provided with example widgets.

Components can work all together or you can use them separate.

Libraries
Dice rolling library
Player function library - working in blueprint you can add player functions anytime and anywhere.
Inventory library- you can add, remove, use functions of inventory anywhere in blueprint.
technicalDetails:
Blueprints: 17
Blueprint components: 7
Blueprint function libraries: 3
Created 100% in blueprints
Documentation included: No
